casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Quintel Martinez AUGUSTINE 130A03-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2017 Gretchen Engel, Attorney at Law, Durham, James E. Ferguson, II, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Augustine, Quintel Martinez. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of N.C. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2017 by State of NC for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of June 2017." Ervin, J. recused
